title: Sound On: Food Crisis, Putin's Annex Move, Where's Jackie?
itunes:title: Sound On: Food Crisis, Putin's Annex Move, Where's Jackie?
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.

Joe spoke with Rep. Jim McGovern of Massachusetts on funding the government, the White House Food Summit and how inflation is making the food crisis worse, Melinda Haring, Deputy Director of the Atlantic Council’s Eurasia Center on Ukraine on Russia's move to annex territory in Ukraine. Plus, our politics panel, Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino & Rick Davis on hurricane politics, Russia moving to annex parts of Ukraine, and President Biden calling out a recently deceased congresswoman in remarks at a hunger conference she helped organize.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
